LanguageData.PathfindingAvoidance.GeneralCostsTooltip: Costs that apply to most cases - colony members, friendly visitors.
LanguageData.PathfindingAvoidance.ColonyCostsTooltip: Costs that apply to colony pawns (colonists, mechs, etc. but not animals).
LanguageData.PathfindingAvoidance.FriendlyCostsToolti: Costs that apply to friendly pawns, such as visiting trade caravans.
LanguageData.PathfindingAvoidance.ExtraCostTooltip: The higher the number, the more pawns will try to avoid such tiles.\n\nDefault value: {0}
LanguageData.PathfindingAvoidance.DirtyCostTooltip: Additional perceived cost for using terrain that produces filth.
LanguageData.PathfindingAvoidance.SideDoorCostTooltip: Additional perceived cost for using door that has the 'Side Door' priority set.
LanguageData.PathfindingAvoidance.EmergencyDoorCostTo: Additional perceived cost for using door that has the 'Emergency Door' priority set.
LanguageData.PathfindingAvoidance.AreaAvoidLowCost: Extra cost for "Path Avoid Low" area cells: {0}
LanguageData.PathfindingAvoidance.AreaAvoidLowCostToo: Additional perceived cost for walking in areas marked "Path Avoid Low".
LanguageData.PathfindingAvoidance.AreaAvoidMediumCost: Extra cost for "Path Avoid Medium" area cells: {0}
Additional perceived cost for walking in areas marked "Path Avoid Medium".
LanguageData.PathfindingAvoidance.AreaAvoidHighCost: Extra cost for "Path Avoid High" area cells: {0}
LanguageData.PathfindingAvoidance.AreaAvoidHighCostTo: Additional perceived cost for walking in areas marked "Path Avoid High".
LanguageData.PathfindingAvoidance.GrowingZoneCost: Extra cost for growing zone tiles: {0}
LanguageData.PathfindingAvoidance.GrowingZoneCostTool: Additional perceived cost for walking on growing zones.
LanguageData.PathfindingAvoidance.VisitingCaravanOutd: Extra cost for outdoor room tiles: {0}
Additional perceived cost for using outdoor room.
LanguageData.PathfindingAvoidance.VisitingCaravanIndo: Extra cost for indoor room tiles: {0}
Additional perceived cost for using indoor room.
